name: eslint-plugin-test-selectors
description: Makes sure test DOM attributes (e.g. data-test-id) are added to interactive DOM elements.
author: David Calhoun

scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --tags && git push
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --tags && git push
scripts.major: npm version major && npm publish && git push --tags && git push
